articles.author: Angelique Chrisafis
articles.title: Johnny Depp’s return to Cannes exposes French split over #MeToo - The Guardian
articles.description: While many oppose actor’s appearance after Heard trials, others prefer to separate person from performer
articles.content: When Johnny Depp appeared on the red carpet at the Cannes film festival this week it was clear France was doing more than any other nation to rehabilitate the actor after he was dropped by US film st… [+5072 chars]
